bug.author: RChadwick7
bug.description: I installed a RTC, set the time correctly earlier, and added this line to /boot/config.txt: dtoverlay=i2c-rtc,ds3231 Now when I start up Pwnagotchi, I get UP time as -5:27:39, and it just sits there. Rebooting shows the same thing (The screen refreshes during reboot)

comments.comment: Nevermind. Disabling the fake hwclock fixed it.
